long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The SalesNash Template Validator - Spam Check is there to fine-tune your outbound outreach. The extension allows you to validate your messaging without even leaving the mailbox. With over 850 spam words in the database (and quarterly list updates) this Spam Checker will minimize your risk of hitting the junk folders.
     Spam-free Messaging: This extension allows you to fine-tune your messaging by checking it for potential spam words.
     In-Mailbox Validation: You don’t need to leave your mailbox - the Spam Checker is available from your extensions bar.
     Extensive Spam Word Database: The extension maintains an extensive database of over 850 spam words.
     These words are carefully curated based on common patterns that spam filters recognize.
     Our team continuously adds new spam words and refines existing ones to stay ahead of evolving spam detection algorithms.
     Risk Minimization: By using the Spam Checker, you significantly reduce the risk of your emails ending up in recipients’ junk folders.
Quality messaging leads to better outcomes, and this extension helps you eliminate one of the biggest bottlenecks!
